quizCol.name: âš½ sports
quizCol.quiz_front_text: Everyone loves Ronaldo! But can you outscore #CR7 fans in this quiz?

quiz_collection.questionMd: *True or False*: Ronaldo donated his bone marrow to help his teammate Carlos Martins' son
How many tattoos on Ronaldo's body?
Ronaldo's first hat-trick for Manchester United was against which club?
*True or False*: Ronaldo was expelled from school due to his obsession for football
*True or False*: Ronaldo's mobile game is called **"Headâ€™s Up!"**
Ronaldo's famous 'Knuckleball' free-kick against Portsmouth in 2008 left which goalkeeper standing?
In 2010, Ronaldo re-upped his endorsement contract with which American sportswear company?
When is Ronaldo's birthday?
*True or False*: When Ronaldo joined Manchester his jersey number was supposed to be **27**
*True or False*: Ronaldo has over **800 million** followers on Instagram
Which player's tackle forced Ronaldo off on a stretcher in the **Euro 2016 final**?
What disease does Ronaldo suffer from?
What was Ronaldo's childhood nickname?
*True or False*: Ronaldo was tested positive for **COVID-19** in October, 2020
How many goals did Ronaldo score in 2008 when he was awarded **FIFA World of the Year Honor**?
Who was Ronaldo's favorite soccer star when he was kid?
What is usually Ronaldo's rest day from his rigorous workout regime?
Where is Ronaldo's official Instagram ID?
*True or False*: Ronaldo sold his **golden boot** to donate the money to fund schools in Gaza for needy children
*True or False*: Ronaldo has his own museum in Funchal named **CR7 Museum**

quizCol.name: ðŸŽ¬ entertainment
quizCol.quiz_front_text: How well do you know the pop icon Bruno Mars? This quiz is strictly for Mars' fans!

quiz_collection.questionMd: *True or False*: **"Money Make Her Smile"** was a track featured in Mars' album **Doo-Wops & Hooligans**
In which song does Mars sing: *"You got your legs up in the sky, with the devil in your eyes, let me hear you say you want it all"*?
Which instrument is played by Mars in his music band apart from being lead vocalist?
What is the opening track of Mars' album **Doo-Wops & Hooligans**?

Guess the music video  
![](https://i.imgur.com/9PTZ7vr.gif)
Which Mars' song won the **Song of the Year** Grammy Award in 2018?
Which Mars' song can be heard from strippers' changing room in the opening scene of **Gorilla** music video?"
*True or False*: Mars appeared in Time magazine's list of the 100 most influential people in the world in 2011
In which song does Mars sing: *"You're everything I see in my dreams. I wouldn't say that to you if it wasn't true"*?

Guess the music video  
![](https://i.imgur.com/rLSkdVj.gif)
In which song does Mars sing: *"Same bed but it feels just a little bit bigger now. Our song on the radio but it don't sound the same"*?
When is Mars' birthday?
*True or False*: Mars' single **"It Will Rain"** was the lead soundtrack of **The Twilight Saga: Eclipse**
What is Mars' official Twitter handle?

Guess the music video  
![](https://i.imgur.com/mJ0k5rz.gif)

Guess the music video  
![](https://i.imgur.com/E19LznZ.gif)
*True or False*: Mars urinated himself during a performance of Elvis' "Can't Help Falling in Love" when he was five
In which song does Mars sing: *"I might mess around and get my college degree. I bet my old man will be so proud of me"*?
*True or False*: **"Versace on the Floor"** was a track featured in Mars' album **Unorthodox Jukebox**
What is Mars' real name?

Guess the music video  
![](https://i.imgur.com/3szlzsQ.gif)
What is the name of Mars' music band?
Where is Mars originally from?
In which song does Mars sing: *"Oh, it's not complicated, so this won't take a while, you see, music make her dance"*?
Mars got his nickname 'Bruno' as resemblance to whom?

quizCol.name: âš½ sports
quizCol.quiz_front_text: You think you know all about Sri Lankan Cricketing Legend? You are not a true fan unless you score 20/20!

quiz_collection.questionMd: *True or False*: Sri Lankan team led by Sanga was defeated by England in finals of **2009 ICC World Twenty20**
Against which team did Sanga score his first **Test century**?
How many runs is the world record for the **highest partnership** in Test cricket set by Sanga and **Mahela**?
Sanga was involved in the highest ever partnership for any wicket in **ICC World T20** history. Who was the other player in this partnership?
Which city Sanga is originally from?
*True or False*: Sanga scored his first **double-century** against Pakistan in 2002
Against which team did Sanga make his **ODI** debut?
In which final game did Sanga win the **Man of the Match** award to help Sri Lanka win the title?
In which year did Sanga score most runs in all formats of the game in **a calendar year**?
Sanga has *not* been a part of which IPL franchise?
*True or False*: Sanga is the first player to win the award **Wisden Leading Cricketer in the World** twice
What is Sanga's middle name?
What is Sanga's highest score in Test cricket?
When is Sanga's birthday?
*True or False*: Sanga is the first batsman ever to score in **excess of 150 in four consecutive tests**
*True or False*: Sanga is the first *non-British* person to be appointed to the role of **President of the MCC**
In which year did Sanga win **ICC Cricketer of the Year**?
In which year did Sanga score his first Test century at **Lord's Cricket Ground** to fulfil his lifetime ambition?
How many **double centuries** has Sanga scored in his Test career?
*True or False*: Sanga holds the record for **most stumpings** in a career as a wicketkeeper in ODIs

quizCol.name: âš½ sports
quizCol.quiz_front_text: How well do you know King of Clay? This quiz is a must take for tennis fans!

quiz_collection.questionMd: What is Nadal's autobiography called?
What other sport Nadal enjoys playing in addition to tennis and football?
What is Nadal's height?
*True or False*: Nadal has **Barcelona** centre court named after him
*True or False*: Nadal always used to wear a watch on-court from his early days
*True or False*: Nadal's match against **Roger Federer** in 2008 is the **longest final** in Wimbledon history (4 hr 48 min)
Which player defeated Nadal to end his streak of 31 wins in a row in **2009 French Open**?
As of 2020, how many times has Nadal defeated **Roger Federer** in the **French Open** final?
Which Gland Slam Champion did Nadal defeat at an exhibition match when he was 15 years old?
In which music video Nadal appeared in 2010?
answers: Just the way you are â€“ Bruno Mars
The Cup of Life â€“ Ricky Martin

quiz_collection.questionMd: How old was Nadal when he won under-12 regional tennis championship?
*True or False*: Nadal is the only player to have ever finished **four consecutive calendar years** at the top
Who did Nadal win his first ATP match against?
Nadal was a promising football player too. Who made Nadal choose one between football and tennis?
Which year was Nadal born?
As of 2020, how many **Wimbledon** singles finals has Nadal played in?
Who was Nadal's uncle who introduced him to the game of tennis?
As of 2020, how many times Nadal has won **Wimbledon** singles?
Where is Nadal originally from?
*True or False*: Nadal is the only player who has defeated **Roger Federer** in the final of a **Grand Slam** on grass, hard, and clay surfaces

*True or False*: According to Forbes, Messi is the world's **highest-paid soccer player** in 2020
How many tattoos on Messi's body as of 2020?
Who is Messi married to?
